meanings.definition: To designate or designate (an area or property) for a different purpose or use.
meanings.sent1: The city council rezoned the empty lot for a new park.
meanings.sent2: The town rezoned the industrial area for residential development.
meanings.sent3: The mayor rezoned the playground for a giant ice cream stand!
meanings.sent4: The decision to rezoned the forest sparked a wave of controversy.
meanings.sent5: The community celebrated when the council rezoned the old factory into a community center.

meanings.definition: To change the zoning classification of (an area or property).
meanings.sent1: The local government rezoned the downtown area for mixed-use buildings.
meanings.sent2: The city rezoned the waterfront for commercial purposes.
meanings.sent3: The committee rezoned the schoolyard for a massive trampoline park!
meanings.sent4: The action to rezoned the neighborhood brought new life to the area.
meanings.sent5: The developers were thrilled when the council rezoned the land for a shopping mall.
